narrative.narrative: Cargolux Italia is a subsidiary of Cargolux of Luxembourg based at Milan Malpensa,Italy. It started in 2009 and as of 2014 has 10 destinations. These include Baku in Azerbaijan,Campinas in Brazil,Hong Kong, Osaka in Japan, Almaty in Kazakhstan, three in the US and Glasgow,Scotland. They also have two 747-400F's.
